Name: Bamboo (Difford's 'Perfect' recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This Bamboo recipe achieves a 'perfect' balance between the dry mineral notes of fino sherry in contrast to both rich bianco and dry vermouths. Classically, two vermouths are used in an attempt to strike this balance, but a vermouth threesome is so much more pleasing.
History: Adapted from numerous other Bamboo recipes by yours truly on 2nd August 2014 and further 'perfected' in January 2023. Bamboo Cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo (Difford's 'Perfect' recipe) contains 101 calories
